mapper.select: select product.spu_id,pag.attr_group_id,pag.attr_group_name,product.attr_id,product.attr_name,product.attr_value from pms_product_attr_value product left join pms_attr_attrgroup_relation paar on product.attr_id = paar.attr_id left join pms_attr_group pag on paar.attr_group_id = pag.attr_group_id where product.spu_id=#{spuId} and pag.catelog_id=#{catalogId};
